definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: It will bottom out at some point.
sentences.chinese: 在某時它會降到最低點。

sentences.english: Last year the number of sunspots dropped to a level not seen since the beginning of the 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 去年太陽黑子的數目降至自20世紀初的最低點。

sentences.english: There is an optimal speed at the lowest permeation ratio.
sentences.chinese: 滲透率最低點對應的轉速爲最佳轉速。

sentences.english: And yet U.S.-Russian relations are worse today than they have been in 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 然而當今美俄關係處於二十年來的最低點。

sentences.english: This little-travelled region may represent the global nadir for herbivores. As a rule, dishes on the Asian steppes and mountains feature mutton or horse.
sentences.chinese: 這個小旅遊地區裏，食草動物在全球處於最低點。
我們現在處於34年來的最低點。

sentences.english: Commercial usage is as much as three times higher at its peak than at its nadir.
sentences.chinese: 商業用電量在最高峯時是最低點是的四倍。

sentences.english: This little-travelled region may represent the global nadir for herbivores.
sentences.chinese: 這個小旅遊地區裏，食草動物在全球處於最低點。

sentences.english: Still, the number of new drug approvals has fallen nearhistoric lows.
sentences.chinese: 但通過的新藥數量還是逼近了歷史的最低點。

sentences.english: Chinese stock market plummets to 16-week low.
sentences.chinese: 中國股市掉落至16周內最低點。

sentences.english: The reputation of the conjurer was rapidly sinking below zero.
sentences.chinese: 魔術師的信譽一下子下降到最低點。

sentences.english: Exhaust valve located at the lowest pointFacilitates the purge.
sentences.chinese: 排氣閥門位於最低點，便於清洗。

sentences.english: The flow equalization zone is connected to the lowest point of the Bio-Module feed chamber.
sentences.chinese: 均衡水流區連接着生物模塊進水箱的最低點。

sentences.english: World stocks reached a four-year low at the start of trading in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 世界股市在歐洲開盤交易時達到了四年最低點。

sentences.english: Car sales, for instance, fell to a nine-year low in July.
sentences.chinese: 例如七月份的汽車銷售量下跌到九年最低點。

sentences.english: Hog futures prices hit a four-year low this past week.
sentences.chinese: 過去一週裏，生豬期貨價格達到了四年來的最低點。

definition: (of a stock price or market index) currently higher than at the previous day's close
